description: This file contains TypeScript code for a TodoMVC application using AngularJS, including class definitions, directives, services, and controller logic.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: Class representing a Todo item with title and completion status.

classes.name: TodoStorage
classes.description: Service for persisting and retrieving Todo items from localStorage.

classes.name: TodoCtrl
classes.description: Main controller managing Todo list, user interactions, and data binding.

methods.name: todoFocus
methods.description: Directive that focuses an element when a bound expression evaluates to true.

methods.name: todoBlur
methods.description: Directive that triggers an expression when an element loses focus.

methods.name: todoEscape
methods.description: Directive that cancels editing when the Esc key is pressed.

methods.name: onPath
methods.description: Handles route changes to filter Todo list.

methods.name: onTodos
methods.description: Updates counts and persists Todo list when changes occur.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new Todo item to the list.

methods.name: editTodo
methods.description: Begins editing a specific Todo item.

methods.name: revertEdits
methods.description: Reverts changes to a Todo item.

methods.name: doneEditing
methods.description: Finalizes editing of a Todo item, removing it if empty.

methods.name: removeTodo
methods.description: Removes a Todo item from the list.

methods.name: markAll
methods.description: Marks all Todo items as completed or active.
